name: Better Than Thanos
description:
Tip: Download the standalone version if the web one is lagging on your system.

Help save the world from overpopulation.

Do better than that purple dud, flick ‘em all!

Our first ever LD, with some sweet headache here and there but fun overall :D

  • 3D by Agus Prima, Ricky Hernando, Tomi Rahmansyah
  • Code by Dennis Samuel, Susanto
  • Audio by Elia Moses, Kevin Christian
